product_name: *READ DESCRIPTION* Splatoon 2 Splatoon 3 Nintendo Switch [US / ASIA - FULL ENGLISH GAMEPLAY]
description:
REFER TO SHOP PROFILE PAGE FOR LIST OF VOUCHER CODES! :) 
Brand new and sealed. 
SPLATOON 2: READY STOCK (KOREAN COVER, FULL ENGLISH GAMEPLAY SUPPORTED)SPLATOON 3: READY STOCK (ENGLISH COVER)
*PLEASE NOTE AND READ FOR SPLATOON 3*Local Asia (MDE) cover with USA game card**. Compatible with US estore.*Local Asia (MDE) cover comes with ESRB rating logo on bottom left of front cover (EXACTLY SAME AS COVER PHOTO)**BOTH ENGLISH or CHINESE language gameplay supported.
*PLEASE NOTE ON INFORMATION FOR BOTH SPLATOON 2 AND SPLATOON 3*NINTENDO SWITCH PLUS SUBSCRIPTION IS NEEDED TO PLAY THIS GAME AS THIS IS A ONLINE MULTIPLAYER GAME. THERE IS NO SINGLE PLAYER GAMEPLAY FOR THIS. NINTENDO SWITCH PLUS HAS TO BE SUBSCRIBED SEPARATELY ON YOUR OWN SWITCH CONSOLE
BELOW INFORMATION IS FOR SPLATOON 2
All EU, KR and US cover comes with English Gameplay! Only difference is the cover photo on the box. Gameplay is exactly the same! - Switch games have no region lock and can be played on ALL switch consoles.- Cover photo on box for KR cover  is in Korean words BUT supports FULL English gameplay.
Self collection is available at Ang Mo Kio MRT and Hougang St 51. Collection timings and locations are subjected to availability. Would suggest that you pm us to check on the collection timings and locations before placing your order. Thank you! :)
Seller will not be responsible for lost mail or damaged item due to delivery. 
*Cover picture on the box of actual game may differ from the cover photo of the item listing

product_name: [SG] Nintendo Switch Game Splatoon 3 (MDE-US)
description:
Gun Size:Size: 430*100*45mm ( Big Gun )Size: 31x5.5x8cm ( Small Gun )
Supported languages: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Traditional Chinese
Ink up the Splatlands in the next Splatoon game! Enter the Splatlands, a sun-scorched desert inhabited by battle-hardened Inklings and Octolings. Splitsville, the city of chaos, is the adrenaline-fueled heart of this dusty wasteland. Even in this desolate environment, Turf War* reigns supreme, and battles rage in new stages located in the surrounding wilds. Dynamic new moves help these fighters dodge attacks and cover more ground, along with a new bow-shaped weapon to sling ink. Join Agent 3 in a fight against the unruly Octarians in story mode. Discover the secrets of Alterna, the Fuzzy Ooze, and how they connect to the mode's theme, "Return of the Mammalians.” Team up and fend off waves of dangerous Salmonid bosses in the next iteration of Salmon Run*, a co-op mode with fresh new features. 
Ink it up with a new entry in the Splatoon seriesDiscover the Splatlands, a new sun-soaked region with trendsetting inhabitantsExperiment with new styles for Inklings and Octolings4v4 Turf Wars are back, with new stages, new maneuvers, and new weaponsJoin Agent 3 in a fight against the unruly Octarians in story mode


# My Gaming Lab - One-stop store for all your gaming needs

product_name: [Nintendo Official Store] Splatoon 3 - for Nintendo Switch
description:
・Product Information・
Splatoon 3Release date: 9th September, 2022Purchase bonus is on a first come first serve basis. [Purchase bonus fully redeemed]
Enter the Splatlands, a sun-scorched desert inhabited by battle-hardened Inklings and Octolings. Splatsville, the city of chaos, is the adrenaline-fueled heart of this dusty wasteland.
Even in this desolate environment, Turf War* reigns supreme and battles rage in new stages located in the surrounding wilds. Dynamic new moves help these fighters dodge attacks and cover more ground, along with a new bow-shaped weapon to sling ink.
Join Agent 3 in a fight against the unruly Octarians in story mode. Discover the secrets of Alterna, the Fuzzy Ooze, and how they connect to the mode's theme, "Return of the Mammalians.”
Team up and fend off waves of dangerous Salmonid bosses in the next iteration of Salmon Run*, a co-op mode with fresh new features. 
* Online play requires a paid membership to Nintendo Switch Online.(Nintendo Switch Online is unavailable in your region.)

description:
Description :Cards for using on Splatoon 3 ( Switch / Wii U)They can be used to unlock new levels, and get weapons and clothing after successfully challenge level.Printed with beautiful artwork on thick high glossy card stock with working NFC chip in the back of card to unlock in-game loot.All cards are high quality build,hidden NFC chip, laminated and tested for functionality.Works exactly like an Amiibo Figure to register on your Nintendo system or unlock loot.(All  cards have been tested to ensure they are properly working)

Custom Amiibo Card Description1. NFC cards contain with amiibo data, customized cards, cost-effective, easy to carry.2. Customized amiibo cards, one day one CD3. Compatible with New3ds , Switch , WIIU console.Note: each amiibo only can be used one time per day in each console.
How to use:1.press "+" bottom in game,choose "system--options"2.set the option in "use amiibo"3.put the card on right stick
Package include:17 pcs Splatoon Cards+Leather Holder Bag

product_name: Splatoon 3 Joycon Thumb Grips, Soft Silicone Joystick Cover for Nintendo Switch/OLED/Switch Lite,4PCS-Octopus
description:
About this item【Unique Design】The cute Octopus Joysticks cover adds funny and vitality into your Switch and Switch Lite, make it more eye-catching.
【Compatible Switch/Lite/OLED】OLEE Joy-con thumb grip is designed for Nintendo Switch/OLED/Switch Lite,which can provide effective protection for your analog sticks.
【Soft and Comfortable Touch】The thumb grip cap is made of high-quality silicone, soft and comfortable.It can protect the analog sticks from scratches and dirt.
【Easy to Install】① Turn over the joystick caps. ② Align on the joystick. ③ Fall the caps. Please note: Check if the caps wrap the joystick completely to prevent them from pop off when you playing.
【Warm Tips】1. This joystick cover is not suitable for PS4, Xbox One controller. 2.Switch /Lite and other accessories are NOT included.

product_name: Nintendo Switch Pro Controller Splatoon 3 Edition
description:
Take your game sessions up a notch with the Pro Controller for Nintendo Switch.
Includes motion controls, HD rumble, built-in amiibo functionality, and more. It is easy to hold with a grip type, it is a wireless controller that can play comfortably even in long-time gameplay in TV mode and table mode. You can also touch data such as amiibo to read and write data. Pro controller supports expressive rich HD vibration.
***Do take note all item will ship from our warehouse there will be no available self collection over our both outlet.***
